page.title: 14Labour, Plaid Cymru and All
page.content: Following the recent revival of interest in the Welsh language, the influence of the Welsh Nationalist Party{Plaid Cymru}has increased, at Local Government level at least. However, the area is still very much a {Labour}controlled one, despite the closeness of the recent Wattsville by- election. In this,{Plaid Cymru}came within 200 or so votes of{Labour}who retained the seat. The M.P. for Islwyn Constituency is Neil Kinnock, leader of the{Labour} party. He visits the constituency often and on 21st June 1985 he launched the "Scitech" Open Tech project at Crosskeys College. The influence of the{S.D.P.}is minimal (only one member on Islwyn Borough Council) and the{Tory Party}is virtually non-existent.
